ygData.subject: Re: A notice and a request
ygData.msgSnippet: (Replying to my own message... this is a first, I think ;oP  ) Also, ask him why our instrument skills don;t cap out as high as the caster skill (Evocation,
ygData.messageBody:
(Replying to my own message... this is a first, I think ;oP )
Also, ask him why our instrument skills don;t cap out as high as the caster
skill (Evocation, etc)

-=B=-
The Rathe
